participant_1.name: Pink
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, she enjoys nightlife and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I waitress during the day to supplement my income. I've light skin with big brown eyes. It's red with blue stripes, so it shines when I race. My main transportation is my motorbike. I wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Reflective and passionate about his work, he has a unique lifestyle that centers around nature and sustainability.
participant_2.background: My name is George. I'm a bee farmer. My favorite food is papaya. I've zero family that I'm close to. I married a supermodel from Italy.
